summary:
The Security Council, 
Taking note of the Secretary-General's letter to the President of the Security Council dated 25 August 2006 (S/2006/688), 
Decides that, notwithstanding Article 12 ter of the Statute of the International Criminal Tribunal for Rwanda, Judge Solomy Balungi Bossa be authorized, effective 28 August 2006, to continue serving as a judge in the Butare case until its completion, despite her elected term as an ad litem judge ending on 24 June 2007.
